website_summaries.verdict: Features a unique Quick Clean mode that lets carpets dry in less than 45 minutes.
pros: Great Hoover features such as SpinScrub brushes and rinse mode
A big 1.25-gallon tank capacity means less stopping to empty
Comes with a two-in-one antimicrobial pet tool for cleaning pet messes thoroughly
Easy to carry, weighing under 19 pounds

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results- easy set up - quick dry
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Hoover Power Scrub Elite Pet Carpet Cleaner, FH50251after doing a lot of research and reading other reviews. Very happy with results - see the dog door entry was embarrassingly filthy. Thought we’d have to replace carpet. It took a few tanks but just look at the carpet now. Really great results. Assembly is easy, only two screws. I like that you can empty the dirty water with having to disassemble the other tank. Have already recommended to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Infowmn

customer_reviews.title: So far very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this cleaner for my son and his wife, we have a much older model that works amazingly. While the cleaner seems to work okay it also leaks as it is being used, leaving a large wet spot on the carpet/floor. My son contacted amazon and was told he needed to take it to a service center, I could understand that if the cleaner was several months old but this has been used 4 times and has leaked every time it has been used. To me that is a lemon and needs to be replaced, I suppose we will see what happens. So far very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Burton

customer_reviews.title: lousy customer service
customer_reviews.text: The brand new water tank leaked and after emailing and calling Hoover twice to no avail, I returned the unit. I really wanted this item and all Hoover had to do was send me a replacement water tank. Thankfully, Amazon refunded my money and I bought a Bissell carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Jake's mom

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for two of them
customer_reviews.text: Owned it for three months. Worked great for two of them. Unfortunately it stopped working. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The second one - both leaked
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased in the last few years. I was hoping the first was a fluke because I loved it until it started leaking. Seven months later the new one leaks too and turns out it is a known issue over multiple models. It is still under warrantee so I will try to get it fixed, but I will never buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: FormbyLyn

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 2 months and its leaking everywhere and not sucking up the water and not spraying.
customer_reviews.author: marisel

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. My rugs were in desperate need of cleaning and they came out better than when we had them professionally cleaned. Worth every cent
customer_reviews.author: wwsakrd

customer_reviews.title: BROKE THE FIRST TIME I REALLY NEEDED TO CLEAN CARPET
customer_reviews.text: Bought December 2018 on sale. Over the past year and a few months, I’ve maybe used it a handful of times to clean up after small pet messes. Today, while trying to clean the basement carpet before listing our home for sale, it stoped working properly. I’ve maybe cleaned a 10 by 10 foot area. Can’t return to Amazon. Very upset. The scrubbers just drag on the carpet, they don’t scrub. It worked great until it broke. Not user error. If I could return, I’d try another one. Maybe it’s just a bad unit or defective unit. I’ll never know as I won’t drop another $200 to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing handle screws...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I would really like to write a review about how this carpet steamer actually cleans, but they did not include the screws to attach the handle. Amazon tech support could not help and I must wait until Monday to talk with Hoover directly. There is NO information that I can find about what type/size/thread screw it uses so I can go to a hardware store and just buy some so I can get started. Maybe I will amend this AFTER I can get some screws to attach the handle...
customer_reviews.author: M. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is not a quality product. The first one we had broke with in two weeks. We sent it back and now the second one won't get the water back out of the item being cleaned. We are getting ready to send it back as well.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Great for gross stains
customer_reviews.text: We have three kids and two dogs that track in a lot of dirt. When we went out of town the dog sitter didn’t follow the rules and my area rug was ruined after they got into the pantry and trash. I decided to be positive and have hope. I ordered this Hoover mainly because of the tank size. It works great! I recommend it. I posted pictures ofthe rug with one area cleaned so you can see the difference and then after I finished.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do much on my carpet. And I used it as directed. Also leaked after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't know about you but I donlt like water running past the electric wires/motor
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the lower model that died less than a year after buying it. Not impressed with this one either What they do not tell you is apparently when you fill the water reservoir to full - it will leak down the machine while you are using it....don't know about you but I donlt like water running past the electric wires/motor! My next one will be a bissell
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Don’t mix different cleaning solutions...clogging
customer_reviews.text: I loved this cleaner until my daughter accidentally mixed two different cleaners in the solution tank. For some reason the two solutions formed a sediment that clogged the dispenser. As it is designed we can clean it out. We have tried it all. A normal solution and water tank could be cleaned but this can’t. A replacement is $80 so not sure it is worth replacing the solution tank vs buying a different cleaner. Warning: don’t mix different solutions!!!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Ever ask yourself why Hoover has been around for so long.  Because they make good products!
customer_reviews.text: I had my previous Hoover Steam Carpet Cleaner since 2011 and used it every 3 months to clean my carpet. It was still working when I gave it to my son; I wanted the newer model since I clean my carpets so often. Hoover has not ever let me down and so I stuck with this company for my new machine. People don't realize how dirty their carpets get and since we have allergies, I want to be sure to clean ours. We also live in the country and there is a lot of dust. My carpet is almost 20 years old and people always say it looks like it is new. This is a great machine and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean pet stains. Still leaves a brownish/ tan marks on carpets.
customer_reviews.text: Did not pick up stains as I expected. I used a pre wash on the pet stains and scrubbed them before using the carpet cleaner. The urine spots came up but not the small stool spots that had been cleaned right away. My dog had had surgery and was sick for about a week. I used the new carpet cleaner on brand new carpet. It did not help. Now I have to pay a professional cleaner to clean up the stains.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner for the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall i was pleased w this cleaner. It did a pretty good job at pulling up high traffic stains (although the Rug Doctor did a better job at getting TOUGH stains out). I like that you can take it apart to clean it after use, and that the cleaner solution is in a seperate part of the clean water tank. My only major complaint is how small the dirty water tank is. It felt like i was spending more time emptying the tank than actually cleaning and that really did aggrivate me so i sent it back and picked up a Rug Doctor.
customer_reviews.author: M.A. Mazur

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY -- Doesn't even last a year
customer_reviews.text: Had it for less than a year, and it randomly started leaking water everywhere, and ruined part of our wooden floors (because we didn't realize it was leaking), and also stopped sucking the water back up. With a quick google search we found this is a common theme with this model. You have to take the whole thing apart, and it could be one or two small parts that have broken. It's probably been used MAYBE 5 or 6 times, and we are very careful with it. I would think the product would last at least a couple of years. Turns out that was a pipe dream.
customer_reviews.author: Casey F.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The carpet cleaner itself works very well when everything is in alignment, but unfortunately, it is a mess. The Cord is short and in a bads spot. The canister that holds water and soap can’t be left with water or soap in it, because it leaks water on the floor, and it leaks soap into the water. Every time you bump into something, the overflow’s stopper activates and shuts off the suction. The recovery tank does not seal very well, and that causes you to lose suction. Overall it is just more trouble than it’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Mythman

customer_reviews.title: No suction power and does not deep clean
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this thing since February and have given it every benefit of the doubt. This does not deep clean your carpets and the upholstery cleaner on it has zero suction power. Honestly save your money. My carpets still have dog urine just sitting on top of it now. Will have to go get a rug doctor to get the job done which is really saying something.....
customer_reviews.author: The Clan

customer_reviews.title: There IS a technique to it.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully! With three cats and twist (frieze) carpeting, we needed our own unit instead of renting the rug doctor a few times per year. I used it wrong for about an hour, though, so watch a little video demonstration, or read the manual carefully. The spray only happens as you move backwards, and you really do need to use the technique they describe. (move backwards with soap spray, forwards without, then backwards with rinse only and forward again without, to extract the water. You can use virtually any cleaner in the tank! I was impressed with the amount of dirt that I extracted.
customer_reviews.author: The Mckeons

customer_reviews.title: Clean Water Tank Leaks Badly
customer_reviews.text: Water/Solution tank leaks, badly, at the back seam where the front plastic piece of the tank is bonded to the rear piece. I contacted Hoover Customer Support; we'll see if the send a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: RJ1894

customer_reviews.title: Stop selling machine with discontinued parts!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine but it leaks and dumped water on the floor . The pump assembly needs replacing , the problem is Hoover discontinued the part. We can’t find it anywhere. Hoover is still selling the cleaner knowing they have a discontinued part and no alternative part to replace it. I really love the machine and would love to have another one but can’t because the same thing can happen and I am out of 179.00
customer_reviews.author: bjw4148

customer_reviews.title: Better than professionals!
customer_reviews.text: After keeping a nationally known carpet cleaning service on speed dial for a couple of years because of our aging dog (who has almost forgotten that she's only supposed to go outside) we were tired of paying the professionals to clean a whole room rather than some specific areas that she frequents. Imagine our surprise when we cleaned the area with this scrubber HOW MUCH dirt it picked up and it had been professionally cleaned about two months ago. It makes me wonder how good the professionals actually did. This was this carpet cleaner's debut so I'll try to remember to update in a couple of months once it's been thoroughly broke in! So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Works great used the floor cleaner and the upolstery and it does very well on both !
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this hoover cleaner and received it I tried the floor cleaner right away did not need the upholstery cleaner right away but when I went to use the upholstery brush to try some time had passed and I did not know I did not receive the Upholstery brush :( I ended up buying one on amazon for 10 bucks. But used it and it works great so we are happy with the floor cleaner .
customer_reviews.author: rayja

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, gets carpets clean and fresh
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, gets carpets clean and fresh, easy to use, especially emptying the dirty water tank, and a separate tank for clean water/detergent. You can switch during use, between wash and rinse, which is a lot easier than my Bissell was, where I had to empty the suds tank and then fill with clean water. It is a little heavier than my Bissell was, which is a bit more strain on my back. I would recommend this product though.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne boyette

customer_reviews.title: No lingering old pee smell in the machine. Yay!
customer_reviews.text: One feature made me choose this model over the less expensive Deluxe model. Antimicrobial brushes. Cleaning them isn't the easiest thing, but not having that old pee smell that they get after awhile when doing routine cleaning is great. I may be praising this one too soon. It has only been a couple of months. Nothing else is spectacular about this machine. It is just like any other good one that does the job and takes up space to store. I recommend it if you have a sensitive nose, as I do, but I have to admit, the less expensive model would probably be a better choice for most folks.
customer_reviews.author: ADay

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace another Hoover shampooer I'd had for about fifteen years. I loved it but replacement parts are harder and harder to find and more and more expensive. Anyway, I used this new one for the first time today. It works as promised. It's a little cumbersome to maneuver and I'm not confident the heat function had any impact on drying time but otherwise, I'm pleased. I was surprised how long the water lasted but, like my old one, when the dirty water tank gets three quarters full, the plunger begins to stick intermittently. Overall, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Corrina Milito

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed!
customer_reviews.text: As long as I have had kids and pets, I have had a Hoover carpet cleaner. Now I am 77, live alone,and had to buy a new cleaner. This one loses suction when the dirty water level hits about 1 inch, requires many trips to the sink to empty. Today, I used the hand tool for the first time, and never got it to work. Can someone from Hoover come to my home and show me how handy and easy this tool is? I am going to buy a new cleaner even though I think this is only about 6 months old, and sadly, it wont be a Hoover.
customer_reviews.author: Gobbie

customer_reviews.title: OK but not great
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this Hoover after having a few Bissel models fail over the years. Good: Hasn't clogged or stopped working...yet. I like having separate tanks for clean and dirty water. Bad: The water tank being on the handle makes it heavy and uncomfortable especially after a lot of cleaning. The Bissel had it on the bottom. Having to store the attachments in a separate bag is lame and plug them in is lame. Bissel had them attached.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W Toner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, better then bissel
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed by this product. I have heard the Bissel products are better at scrubbing dirt out of the carpets but the features on this vacuum outweigh its slightly less thorough scrubbing abilities. The attachments are much better designed, the suction is better than any Bissel I have used, the dual chamber water and soap reservoir is a superior design, and the price point was far lower than Bissel making this much more attractive. I recommend this unit over Bissel large carpet cleaners because of its ease of use, better design, and lower price. Its scrubbing performance may not be quite as good as a Bissel but all its other features are better.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Little

customer_reviews.title: Only worked a few times
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve had this for less than a year and used it Mabye 6 times. The gasket on the dirty water tank has already broken. When I call customer service they said that isn’t covered in the warranty I would have to purchase a whole different dirty water tank to fix this issue. It was working great until this. I find it crazy that they won’t replace this as party if the 2 year warranty
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: This carpet machine works great! We just adopted a new puppy that’s had a couple of accidents in the house. It took the spots and odor right up! The suction is strong and the carpet dried in less than an hour. The water and waste containers are a good size, which help minimize the trips back and forth to the sink. A tip I’ve learned with having carpet machines is that occasionally if it hits an uneven surface (such as a rug) it can disrupt the suction. Just turn it off and back on to fix this problem. I would highly recommend this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Best I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I have Berber carpet which is hard to clean but this cleaner really picked up dirt. You can’t really see how good it cleaned on the Berber until I look at it at an angel and it really got the dirt out and dried quick. We have 2 flight of stairs and the hose isn’t long so it’s not entirely stair friendly but I had my mom hold it while I cleaned the steps. I attached a picture of how many steps I have in the first floor
customer_reviews.author: Jas young

customer_reviews.title: Good product does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it twice so far and cleaned the whole condo. It works very well and the suction is good, you just have to take your time when washing the carpet. I like the ease of seen what I have cleaned and the fact that it has a large container for the water and soap for the carpet cleaning, and the dirty water from the carpet once it reaches the full mark. I have no complaints with this machine, it works and it cleans, and the price was very good. Paid $175.00 dollars for it. It will serve me well for years ahead.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Must own for a pet lover
customer_reviews.text: We have a shiba who is a little ball of fire. This thing helps clean up any stains made from treats, mud, etc that ends up in the house. Great cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have used my cleaner twice now. The carpet was pretty bad. It's been a year since I had it professionally cleaned. I have 4 dogs, one cat and a son-in-law with a dirty job. I have to say I am very impressed with this. It cleaned the carpet very well. The machine parts themselves are so easy to clean because it comes completely apart with a snap or a lever. The tanks for the solution and clean water are separate. No mixing and easy to fill. The dirty water reservoir is good sized and easy to remove, empty and return. It really is nice to use! Not like those bulky, heavy rentals. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great Carpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We got a puppy at Christmas. He was just 10 weeks old. It's been tough potty training him with the cold weather. We've struggled to keep our carpets clean with his accidents. In February, we purchased this carpet cleaner. We've been very pleased with it. We keep it ready to go so that we can clean any accidents with it immediately. A week ago, we had our normal carpet cleaning appointment with a friend that is a professional carpet cleaner. He commented that our carpets look very good. They don't have the normal stains that usually show on pet owners carpets. It's a good machine and the price is reasonable for what you get. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are straightforward, and the machine is easy to use. I was appalled at the color of the water in the tank after cleaning what I thought were pretty clean rugs. The rugs looked much better- brighter colors- and felt better too. The machine I bought did not come with an attachment for cleaning stairs, which was a disappointment. I will buy one separately . Overall, I am very pleased with this machine after using it to clean 4 areas rugs, one of which is an expensive wool oriental rug.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Carpets Are Like New
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carpet cleaner to clean up after two cats that have been puking and having accidents on my floor for a few years now. There was also a recent drink spill right in the middle of my living room that left a stain I couldn't get rid of with spot cleaner. This thing obliterated that stain and erased the dinginess of the carpet from the years of issues my cats have had on it. I love how much water it holds and how you can choose to spray water with cleaning solution or just water by itself to rinse. I was able to clean the high-traffic/spill/accident areas of my living room and bedroom before running out of water.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like this rug machine and seems to do a pretty good job. East to clean out and I like that it mixes the cleaning solution so you don't have to scrub the rug, then go over it again with just water. The attachment seem to be cheaply made compared to the the last Hoover rug scrubber I had and they didn't really do a great job with using it for the interior of my car. It left the seat wetter than my last Hoover. This is why I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars. My last Hoover rug scrubber lasted 18 years I hope this will last at least half that time.
customer_reviews.author: Two fat ladies

customer_reviews.title: Good machine.
customer_reviews.text: The dogs are shedding. Ewe. One had an accident because he was sick and the medication he was on messed up his tummy. The picture of the doggie on the floor is before. The others are after. The cleaner came with a sample bottle. Although I kind of was under the impression that the carpet would be less wet, once I rinsed it (I went over it kind of faster than when I was in wash mode) it did dry a little better. Also the rinse mode is warm water. So overall I do recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Machine
customer_reviews.text: My Hoover (similar model) finally gave up after about 20 years of good service. I selected the similar model because of the previous durability. This machine is amazing--it was so easy to assemble and use that i thought i must be missing something or something was missing!! I have two cats. They make mistakes. This cleaned up spots that have been there for a long time. The carpet looks like Stanley Steamer was here!! I did find the machine quite heavy but considered it part of my exercise plan! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tina from Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome
customer_reviews.text: So here's the thing. I have two cats. And hairballs happen. And you'd never know looking at my carpet that it's not brand new. Dominos buffalo hot sauce, blue gatorade, exploded black pen, a few beers, and some other things happened to an off white carpet. It's still off white. Like everyone else says, vacuum extensively, and if you have any doubt, vacuum again. Then GO SLOW!!!!! I love this machine, it's easy to use, easy to set up, although a little bulky to stash in my closet. Still worth it. Other brand I rented at home depot for a crap load of money didn't do nearly as good a job.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.K

customer_reviews.title: The BEST carpet shampoo machine I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and received this machine last June 2019. This week, June 2020, I finally used it to clean my carpets. Fantastic scrubbing power, excellent cleaning and rinse water removal and next day carpets completely dry! This carpet cleaner is, for me, a big bad bear when it comes to removing dirt and stains that our family, kids and dogs, had left in our carpets. Plus it's a great upper body workout. Yes, Hoover, I LOVE THIS MACHINE! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Have used this once since purchase. So far, so good. Works well, carpet is not soaked, cleans well and is easy to clean up and empty. Thanks to the person who posted about washing the carpet with water only and no soap or detergent. What a difference. Totally unbelievable. Carpet is clean, but isn't sticky or tacky or feels like something is on it. Stains wash right up and do not seem to stick to the carpet. We used to wash our carpet often because of our cat and it seemed as if the traffic ways picked up stains instantly....now that we washed without soap...that is not happening. We won't have to wash every 6 months o so!!!
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product
customer_reviews.text: I had cleaned my carpets with a rented Rug Doctor just before Thanksgiving. I bought this because the Rug Doctor didn’t seem to get the carpet very clean, so I bought this while it was on sale. Great decision! I used this about a week after the rented cleaner and not only did the carpet look substantially better, it dried much faster because it sucks out the water extremely well. Another thing I like is the upholstery attachment; it is much easier to connect/disconnect than a Rug Doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating functionality
customer_reviews.text: I find this device extremely frustrating to use. It constantly stop suction in the middle of cleaning even after I've followed the instructions to clean the dirty water frequently, the filter, obstacles in the nozzle, etc etc. Then when it stops it drops spots/lines of dirty water on the already clean carpet and makes it even harder to get those dirt spots out. When it consistently works properly, it cleans pretty well but otherwise, this product is a POS.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and great cleaner but...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product. It cleans easy and so easy to use. It’s just depressing that they chose to take a shortcut and not include appropriate tracements for more versatility. In this day and age, I can’t comprehend why not add the stair attachments for instance. Instead they go cheap with some sort of scrubber that’s not practical at all. I was tempted to give it just 2 stars for that but it is a great product so it does the bulk of the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ascaris

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I got this because of my dog and my older cat. The dog tracks mud inside on rainy days, and the cat is up there in age and doesn't always make it to the litter box in time (yuck). This does the job of cleaning the carpets very well, using the pet cleaning solution with it. I was even able to get rid of a couple old pet stains in the carpet which my old carpet cleaner was unable to do. Just make sure that you vacuum to get the pet hair up before using the carpet cleaner, as it tends to clump up with excess pet hair if you don't.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: excellent cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: This machine is large, and heavy when the water bucket is filled, but is very easy to use . It has great suction, and removes dirt you cant see, even if you think your rugs are clean . Comes with various attachments for smaller spaces and the receiving water bucket is easy to remove and dispense. It has a deep clean feature as well a general feature and can be used on hard surfaces as well as rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: If you’re considering it... buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got to say... I LOVE THIS THING. My husband and I have talked about getting a shampooer for a long time and we finally but the bullet on this one. So far (in just a few months) it has already paid for itself! The suction is awesome, we love that it has a hose, and it is so easy to clean. It’s relatively lightweight compared to some others we’ve used, and does just fine sucking up the pet hair our vacuum misses.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: This thing works good
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clean the carpets in my house before selling it the family of four had lived in it for 20 years out here in bush ak . The only maintenance the carpets had seen was a vaccuum. The pic shows the line where i stopped for the day . There were places i had to go over it 4 to 5 times to remove sand mud and carpet fresh that didnt come up with vaccuums. Some may expect more on their white carpet in the city but for out here in the bush it works so well im thinking about letting my boy try to make a buisness of cleaning carpets here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great clean machine for your carpet.
customer_reviews.text: This is great machine. I holds alot of water and solution so you can clean alot before refilling. The suds do foam up and cause the recovery to be dumped before refilling the water. It's great to have control on the water being put down and it cleans very nicely. I will be using this about every 6 months to clean the carpets. It actually pulled hair out the carpet that the vaccum doesn't get. The tank has a soap on and clean water on. You choose what option you want. I guess I missed that but was very surprised. It's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: I have kids, pets and live near dirt- highly recommend this cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area where it’s primarily dirt and gravel so it gets tracked into my house a lot. I also have kids and pets which makes finding the right carpet cleaner to accommodate those factors plus the type of carpet I have (I think it’s Berber) difficult. I was skeptical about reading the reviews but decided to give it a shot. It did an excellent job. I could see the difference right away. For some reason I can’t add pics but regardless I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect on rugs/carpet, the trigger sticks on the upholstery attachment.
customer_reviews.text: If your only going to use this for rugs and carpet 5 star all the way, but upholstery attachment needs a lot to be desired. The trigger sticks causing you to get your couch/etc way too wet making it take for flipping ever to dry, and the little hose for the upholstery attachment to feed your cleaner through (not the vacuum line) sticks in so hard that when you go to take it off for cleaning it feels like your seriously gonna break it with the force it takes to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Megellin

customer_reviews.title: GO FOR
customer_reviews.text: Just when you think your carpets really can’t be too dirty because they “look” ok...well, along comes a carpet cleaner that will prove you (to the point of embarrassment) dead wrong! This carpet cleaning machine is unbelievable! I’m a really persnickety housekeeper, and I just may have met my match! There are plenty of different machines out there for purchase, so do yourself a favor...don’t waste another minute of time or amount of money on any other choice! You’ll be glad you read this review!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Keller

customer_reviews.title: Take your time and it works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions don't use boiling water and don't expect to resurrect a 25 year old carpet and this does a fine job. I had a cat at end of life made a mess of my rug and I gave this a shot to resurrect it and it did a wonderful job I recommend it. I think people that give it a bum rap don't take the time to be patient enough to let the thing work on its own. I didn't use the stair suction hose but the thing works good enough on rugs as it is that I wanted to get my review out sooner than later to dispel the bum raps.
customer_reviews.author: Bwana

customer_reviews.title: cleans well, strengthens your muscles
customer_reviews.text: This works well, cleans well, and is easy to clean the machine afterwards. The only draw back is that the clean water tank is located on the handle, so you are pushing all the weight of the water with every back and forth movement. I'm in pretty good shape and my muscles were sore the next day! I vacuumed with my Kirby (everyone knows how heavy they are) after shampooing a room and I nearly threw it through the wall because of how light it seemed after using this! It did work well, and I would recommend it to anyone who can handle the weight.
customer_reviews.author: bzytchr

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase! I’ve used this twice now in my own home and lent it out to a friend and both he and I can’t believe how much dirt came up! Great value. I’m glad I purchased this instead of renting one. Very easy to use. I would highly recommend to vacuum two or three times before use. My carpets are much cleaner and fresher! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: CraftyKitty

customer_reviews.title: Cat Urine Be Gone
customer_reviews.text: First photo is the carpet after using this cleaner, the corner of the carpet is what it looked like before. Second photo is the previous cleaner I was using compared to this cleaner. If you have multiple cats and deep pile rugs, don't try and skimp by purchasing a cheaper model made by another brand. I'm a Hoover man now, and this cleaner has saved my sanity by actually removing urine from the carpet. The only thing I should make you buyers aware of is the heavy weight of the unit, not a problem for me and it assists with the cleaning but it will be more to haul around.
customer_reviews.author: The Logical Purveyor

customer_reviews.title: Love having my own carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a few months but I am very pleased with this steam cleaner. I rented gunky cleaners for years from supermarkets and Lowe’s and I feel this cleaner does every bit as well if not better than the store rentals. I have an older dog who has her accidents and this really cleans it up well, not just carpet but it has done well on my throw rugs. That being said it’s not for all throw rugs if you have Persians and such I would not recommend use as it will definitely bleed
customer_reviews.author: nutnhoney1

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this over a year now and I clean my carpets every couple months or as needed. It works great and I have no issues with it. Good suction and cleaning power and holding up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lowder

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tile, But NEEDS Squeegee Attachment
customer_reviews.text: Works great on tile, IF you have the squeegee attachment, otherwise leaves too much water on the floor. Hoover.com says the "Squeegee Body w/Overmold" part 302658002 isn't available to order online, but you can get it by calling Hoover at 1.800.944.9200. Don't call on Mon. or Tue. or long wait on hold. Note Hoover was bought by Techtronic Industries Co. Ltd so you can also try ttifloorcare.com. Tile cleaning tip 1: empty the waste container about twice for every tank of water/cleaning solution to have best water removal/suction. Tile cleaning tip 1: I diluted the floor cleaning solution since we have soft water. Also rinsed really well.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity, excellent, deep cleaning ability!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t ask for a better product for the price. Deep cleaned two carpets yesterday and the results were quite amazing. I found that a second pass in the “Rinse” mode pulled up even more residual dirt. The detergent is automatically metered, no annoying measuring. The included 8’ hose and attachments will be handy for capturing all the “dog glitter” in our car seats. ❤️🐶 Having 5 cats and 2 dogs makes this a product that will be well used. I have zero negative comments, 100% positive !!
customer_reviews.author: GotWot7573

customer_reviews.title: watch out Mr Clean
customer_reviews.text: this is my 3rd shampooer in many years. This is the best one yet, for the price it has enough bells and whistles to do a great job. I even did our hardwood floors and was surprised how much dirt came up. I used a towel afterwards to get rid of the moisture. Our beige carpets look brand new. I have no issues at all with this product. It is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Ragman

customer_reviews.title: Great value for such an awesome shampooer!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and works great! This is the first shampooer that I've owned that I can actually tell a huge before/after difference! I don't have carpet but I have several large,delicate area rugs. It is powerful but didn't cause piling on the rugs. I have 3 dogs, one of which is a senior, and this did a fantastic job removing the few pet stains that I have. The photo is of my kitchen throw rugs. I ran 2 swipes over the larger rug and look at the difference compared to the non shampooed rug! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jo B.

customer_reviews.title: Hoover pet pro elite carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to clean carpets in our new home. Worked well. Used the accessories to clean the stairs, and it works but you do need to manually scrub. The filter kept getting clogged while using on the carpet flooring. When that happens the red cap pops up and prevents the machine from suctioning. I took apart all of the pieces and cleaned it when I was half way through my house. Even with it all cleaned out the slightest bump with send the suction cap closed and stop it from sucking. That’s why I gave it a four star. Other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: mark scherer

customer_reviews.title: Great steam vac
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy to use steam vac and great price. We have pets and have to clean our carpets and couches and this works great at cleaning both. We've used it several times and the only issue I've had is it not dispensing water from the hands attachment. Iyt sporadic and seems to only happen for a few seconds. Otherwise it's really easy to empty and fill back up and does a great job cleaning carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Schraufnagel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many rug scrubbers over the years but this one really stands out to me for ease of use, ease of cleaning, and the great job that it does. My carpets not only smell fresh but the improvement in color/shine and no tacky feel afterwards makes this an excellent machine in my estimation. Have had for well over a year used moderately and no problems whatsoever. Very pleased with this purchase and the cleaner. Not difficult to move or maneuver and carpets dry fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy I.

customer_reviews.title: Quick mode: impressive
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this carpet cleaner a few days ago finally. It came today and I was excited so of course I had to test it in our bedroom because of the dogs staying in there while we work. Plus a toddler. I’m so impressed, these results were on the Quick clean setting, not even the deep clean. These stains have been on our floor for Atleast a year, without stain treatment prior to doing this. So far I definitely recommend, I have not used it on the stars or the hose yet.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: This thing really knows how to clean a carpet.
customer_reviews.text: I have used (and owned) a lot of different carpet cleaners in my life. This is the best one that I have ever used. I love the big tank, and the suction power is off the charts! Easy to clean, fill and use. The storage bag for the attachments was a pleasant surprise.The only thing that I could find fault with, if I had to find one is that the cord could be longer. Wonderful machine!!
customer_reviews.author: Jules33

customer_reviews.title: Best carpet cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have really high expectations for this because I have rented a rug doctor several times and it didn’t do anything. I can say with all honesty that this blew me away. I am a rover sitter so I constantly have dogs in and out of my house peeing/ pooping on the carpet. One dog threw up and that’s why we ended up buying this. I’m probably going to be using this thing like once a week and I’m so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Allen Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews for several units and this one held up the best among the various models. After having used it extensively I can say with confidence it works very well for the purpose intended. The only thing that I’ve had any issue with is the dirty water tank had a float. It will stop suction prematurely if you have too much soapy water returning. Long story but I don’t expect most people to have that issue. If you pull the grey filter down a touch and leave about a quarter inch gap, it solves that annoyance. Otherwise it is a fantastic machine, very happy with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVING IT!
customer_reviews.text: My aunt gave told me to give up on Bissel carpet cleaners after I complained to her about my second one in about 2 years no longer working - and we paid quite a lot for each of those. I haven't stopped thanking her yet! This carpet cleaner is da diggity bomb! (<--how's that for a Baby Boomer trying to sound hip?) Does a fantastic (!) job of cleaning our rugs, we really see a huge difference. It's easy to use, does a great job, and the rugs dry faster than I've ever had them dry with any other carpet cleaner! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: for pets, this is a Must
customer_reviews.text: If you have pets, this makes it a breeze to clean up after them. My pups are getting older and accidents happen. The separate solution and water tanks means I don't have to guess at the right mixture. I can pull the machine out of the closet, do the clean up, clean it out, and put it away. Works on tile, wood, and carpet. The small nozzle attachment makes it easy to get my coffee spills on the stairs. No more towel clean up or blotting. If this one quits or breaks, I'll get another.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs. One that sheds like crazy. The other loves to track dirt/mud on my carpet. The machine that I had before this one was so hard to clean after using and it would get clogged with dog hair. After researching my options, I ordered this one. I have been very impressed with how well it cleans my carpets. Love the heat dry feature. It's super easy to clean the machine after using it. Super easy to get the dog hair out of the brushes/machine. Also super easy to disassemble/reassemble. The only negatives are its very loud and heavy. Despite those things, I would highly recommend this machine. It gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: sdbluej25

customer_reviews.title: does the job!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 16 year old carpet and a dog who likes the dirt. so my carpet can get really dark. I was amazed by the job this machine did. the black dirt and grime disappeared! its not as heavy as my last one and you can remove the dirty water container without having to release the handle all the way down like my old one (which was also a hoover). I don't have stairs so I cant say anything about that but I do like the quick clean for not so dirty areas.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great Rug Scrubber!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a rug scrubber that focuses on the water extraction. This is the first item I have found that meets my expectations. The unit is easy to use, very powerful and does the job very well. I am enjoying using the additional attachments as well. The instructions are clear and concise. Assembly of the unit is quite simple
customer_reviews.author: ShellBell71

customer_reviews.title: Works great, dries fast, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. Even with hand and wrist problems I am able to use this machine to clean carpets. The carpet dries fast, and the removable containers are easy to handle. I have two shelter dogs I am only able to keep because I have this machine to clean up after them. Great addition to my house cleaning regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my cleaning arsenal for periodic carpet cleaning. For small stains I find the little green machine is better: you can set it up more quickly. But for cleaning a whole room's worth of carpet, this thing is great. I've had it for two years and it's still going strong. Very easy to clean out when done.
customer_reviews.author: K D

customer_reviews.title: Hoover carpet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but after a couple of weeks it started leaking! Now Hoover says they will replace with a comparable model, not what we have, we are supposed to cut the cord send them pictures, and then they will send the new cleaner. So we get to Dispose of the defective one, and probably won’t even get a decent cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made Trigger and solution line mechanisms for upholstery tool. For floors, it's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine for carpets but upholstery tool has poor suction and now I'm having trouble with the spray coming out of upholstery tool. Main reason I needed one of these was for my couch/furniture and now it's no good. I got this about 9 months ago and product support window has closed, so the site says.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Weller

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price this thing rocks. I cannot believe what came out of the carpet gross!! I have used it twice and I can seriously tell the difference. Easy to use easy to store. Only downside is that if you have a long staircase it can be difficult as the machine is heavy when full. Overall I’m very happy with the way this cleans and know this will save me a ton on cleaning bills.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use quick dry time
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! This is the best shampooer I have ever used! We have a new house but with life comes dirty carpets. The suction to minimize dry time is great. The rinse feature makes such sense and again the suction is great. Easy to clean and use. We even used it on large area rugs. Since we have laminate floors too, we cleaned the rugs on the garage floor rather than put plastic beneath the rug. Less expensive than taking to the cleaners and quick dry time!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I found this machine worked well in sucking up alot of dirt out of my carpet, the only thing i found that might be difficult for some people , if you don't have strong arms, is the full clean water tank is mounted on the handle so you are basically holding that up as you move the cleaner around. Its not terribly heavy but it could be a problem for someone. Otherwise I have only used it once and i feel it did a pretty good job.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovetoshop

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh gosh, where do I start. I purchased this for dog stains....It stands up to all its descriptions. I use it every 2 weeks on our carpets. Leaves them looking great. Cleans fantastic and does suck all the water up to leave the carpet fairly damp, and the drying time is short!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Terry

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Great
customer_reviews.text: It really does a great job of cleaning following the directions that come with the unit. You do end up getting water and emptying the dirty water several times on larger rooms, however larger tanks would make the unit large and heavy. This is just the right size and does great on dog related dirt, sandy clay, and dirt in general. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DQ in TN

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet cleaner for great price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Cleans well. Got this on a awesome discount during Cyber Monday. We had to go over some tougher/older stains a couple times, but everything came out! Pre-treat spots with a carpet stain remover before-hand for the really tough stains. We had no issues with leaks. I'd recommend getting extra jugs of the cleaning solution. It only comes with a small cleaning bottle that is good for one fill up. Other than that this Hoover works as intended! No more Stanley Steemer visits for us!
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after second use !!!
customer_reviews.text: Did great the first time. Cleaned up spots pretty good for the most part. But could’ve done better for the price. I wouldn’t say deep clean is the greatest. Also stopped suctioning water after the second use !! Luckily amazon was able to refund me since it was within the month.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Three Boys Make This a Necessity
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this unit on sale over the holidays. We've borrowed my mothers Hoover carpet cleaner for years and it got to the point where we couldn't keep up with the dirt and mud my three boys tracked into our apartment. This Hoover is lighter than previous models and last longer with its oversized water and waste tanks. Having three boys in a small apartment makes this unit a must-have. We are used to Hoover quality and this meets those expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Brandonhyl

customer_reviews.title: the odors got even worse after the cleaning
customer_reviews.text: The carpet machine can clean the carpet stains after the first time cleaning. But since I have a dog at home, there is some pet odors on the carpet, the odors got even worse after the cleaning. Very likely is that the machine warms up the cleaning liquid and it kinda of make the odor more obvious but without fully soak it. If you want to clean stains, this is a good machine. But, I don’t recommend if you want to remove pet odor from the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Better than Stanley Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I had Stanley Steamer do our rugs it cost over $400. Two months later I bought the Hoover cleaner. I just used warm water no soap in my Hoover and it did such a great job. EASY SUPER EASY to clean!!!!! The brushes come off for cleaning I used an old comb to get all the carpet fibers out! What an improvement over their older models. I have several Dyson Vacs, and now with my new Hoover power scrub my 21 year old carpets are like NEW
customer_reviews.author: sheri spring

customer_reviews.title: Nice improvement over previous model.  I now have two of these - home and lake home.
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous model with the spinscrub brushes and it worked way better than one another family member had from that other mfr with a B. I gave it to my daughter for her house and got this one for me. The biggest improvement on this is it is MUCH easier to remove and reinstall the fresh and dirty water tanks which makes doing large rooms much faster and less effort. It does a great job cleaning and drying the carpet because fan blows motor heat out the bottom onto the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Mrfixit

customer_reviews.title: Needs more vacuuming  power
customer_reviews.text: Just does not clean as well as I expected less power should have gone into drying the carpet and more power should have gone into sucking all the stuff including the water out of the carpet
customer_reviews.author: Roy Larson

customer_reviews.title: Does the job on Carpet. Not for Hard Floors!
customer_reviews.text: It is much lighter and easier to use than the older models. It isn't as wide as the one I had previously, but that is a trade off I'm willing to take for the lighter weight. Unfortunately I can't use it on hard floors. That is a HUGE disappointment for me. I have a large "dog room" that the dogs go in and out a doggie door. This can become quite messy with 3 boxers, so rather than mopping I was hoping to use this. Instead I am still using the Floormate. It works, but it is much smaller, so it takes longer for such a large area.
customer_reviews.author: Gina P

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is our third one. Been using them for years as we have 4 dogs and the wife is fanatical about cleanliness. It is difficult to use on stairs due to size. Cleans well bur hose won't reach full distance. Have to clean bottom half then carry unit to top of stairs and clean the rest. But the cleaning is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have owned 2 years now, Stopped Scrubbing After Handful of Uses
customer_reviews.text: I am 2 years into the product and have used it a handful of times. This last time the scrubbers just didn't work. The machine is worthless without this feature because the spray and sucking don't quite get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get out pet odor was no match for this machine. Pulls up a lot of water so doesn’t take as long to dry. Easy to assemble and use. Love the attachments. Water capacity was great, was able to do 1 1/2 rooms on one fill.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet cleaner for pet parents!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered I had to return because it wouldn’t collect more than 1/2 of water in the dirty water tank. It also leaked from the gasket between the clean water tank and the machine. This one works perfectly! I love this machine. I had an older model that lasted a few years but then the motor went out so I got this one and I’m very pleased with the machine and Amazon for quickly replacing it. I haven’t used it on stairs but I didn’t want to detract from my five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Barnett

product_meta.title: Hoover FH50251PC Power Scrub Elite Pet Upright Carpet Cleaner and Shampooer, Lightweight Machine, Red
product_meta.description: Hoover Power Scrub Elite Pet Carpet Cleaner FH50251PC was designed for improved cleaning performance and superior drying. It features two modes, Deep Clean and Quick Clean, to help you tackle all of your cleaning needs. Deep Clean Mode powerfully removes embedded dirt and stains for whole home cleaning, while Quick Clean Mode with Heat Force speeds up drying to allow carpets to dry in less than 45 minutes - getting you back on your floors faster. Our Spin Scrub Brush System helps prevent odors and bacteria from forming in the tool when you are tacking the toughest pet messes and Wash/Rinse Mode removes solution residue to deliver a powerful clean. The Hoover Power Scrub Elite Pet Carpet Cleaner was created with active families in mind – now you can clean easier, so you can get back to what matters most. Motor Amps: 10 Amps.
feature_bullets: Spin scrub system: Powerfully removes deep-embedded dirt and stains with 360 degree brushes and strong suction while being gentle on your carpet.
Fast dry time: Tackle surface stains as they happen with Quick Clean Mode and enjoy dry carpets in 45 minutes.
Large capacity tanks: Two tank system with a 25% larger tank keeps dirty water separate from the clean water so you can clean more and refill less often
Automatic detergent mixing: Take the guesswork out of mixing solution, power scrub elite mixes the correct combination for you. Suction technology- Dual V
What’s included: 8’ hose to deep clean hard-to-reach areas, 2-in-1 pet tool attachment to remove pet hair, stains, and odors, and sample bottle of carpet cleaning pet solution
